mapper.insert: insert into res(resNO, u_id,company,g_no, name, price,checkIn,checkOut,checkInTime,checkoutTime,resform, resdate) values(#{resNO}, #{u_id},#{company},#{g_no}, #{name}, #{price},#{checkIn},#{checkOut},#{checkInTime},#{checkOutTime},#{resform}, now())
mapper.select: select * FROM res WHERE u_id=#{u_id} AND paymentstate = 'F';
